item.title: Re: Trainers
item.content:encoded:
It used to be, before the Recode, that Villagers could learn Jutsu from regular Allies that other Villagers had, even if they themselves didn't have that Ally. So if you and I were in the same village and you had Z-Dog but I didn't, I could still learn Z-Dog's jutsu, only at a +50% JXP penalty.

This made it too easy to get certain Jutsu, like Epic Dog Urination and Bring Down the House, and it was removed.
